name: Max Addons for Bricks Builder
author: BloomPixel

sections.description:
Supercharge Bricks Builder with Powerful, Creative, and Fully Customizable elements. Enhance your experience and get a whole new experience of using Bricks Builder with Max Addons.

Max Addons for Bricks Builder includes a list of advanced elements that not only make your website building process easy but also help you to meet your design requirements.

Extend Bricks Builder Functionality And Build Beautiful Websites In Just a Few Clicks!

Key Features Of Max Addons

  1. AII-in-One Package of Bricks Elements
  2. Lightweight and Fast Loading
  3. Multiple Styling Options
  4. Mobile Responsive
  5. Customizable

🏆 ## Max Addons – List of FREE Elements

  1. Call To Action Button – Create an attractive call-to-action button with a stylish Title and Description. Entice your visitors to take action with an eye-catchy call-to-action block.
  2. Flip Box – Display content impressively with the Flip Box element. With Flip Box, you create an info box and add dual side content with flip animations.
  3. Icon List – Create a beautiful feature section and highlight features with multiple icon types.
  4. Image Accordion – Create a gorgeous image showcase and toggle between image panels easily.
  5. Image Comparison – Display Before and After versions of images.
  6. Multi Heading – Decor your page headings with multiple styling options available with the Multi Heading element.
  7. Contact Form 7 Styler – Customize default Contact Form 7 fields and create stylish contact forms with the Contact Form 7 Form Styler Element.
  8. Gravity Forms Styler – Customize default Gravity Forms fields and create stylish contact forms with the Gravity Forms Styler Element.
  9. Fluent Forms Styler – Customize default Fluent Forms fields and create stylish contact forms with the Fluent Forms Styler Element.
  10. Random Image – Show different image on your webpage on each page refresh with Random Image Element.
  11. Content Ticker – Show latest updates, breaking news or featured posts with Content Ticker element.
  12. Rating – Show ratings on your pages with dynamic icon options with Rating element.

REVIEWS FROM OUR HAPPY CUSTOMERS 💚

Fast, performant and great support – best Addon for Bricks Builder – Joachim B. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Great Plugin With Awesome Elements – wyamout ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Some Good Free Elements in Here – tbutcher ⭐⭐⭐⭐

🏆 MORE CREATIVE ELEMENTS ON PRO VERSION

  1. Post Tiles – Display your website’s posts in a beautiful magazine tile layout.
  2. Table – Create data tables with advanced styling and functionalities.
  3. Timeline – Display content on your website in customizable horizontal & vertical timelines.
  4. Content Toggle – Switch between two types of content, such as primary/secondary or annual/monthly, by using the Content Toggle Element.
  5. Unfold – Fold/Unfold content on your web pages using the Unfold Element. This creative element helps you display more content in less space.
  6. SVG Animation – Add impressive animations to SVG files on your website without any coding.
  7. Hotspots – The Image Hotspot Element allows you to display product features, create virtual tours, and display information easily and interactively.
  8. Image Gallery – Showcase beautiful images on your website using advanced filters and customizable features.
  9. Off Canvas – Add a beautiful flyout navigator and create an advanced off-canvas menu that displays the content when the trigger is activated.
  10. Slide Menu – Create responsive menus with amazing sliding effects.
  11. Video – Allow to embed video on WordPress sites from popular video sources.
  12. Video Gallery – Create a fast-loading video gallery with advanced filters and powerful customizations.
  13. WooCommerce Add to Cart – Create a custom Add-To-Cart button & let your users add products quickly.
  14. Breadcrumbs – Add breadcrumbs to any page of your website with extensive styling options.
  15. Instagram Feed – Display images from your Instagram profile on your website.
  16. Lottie – Add amazing Lottie animations to your website.
  17. Table of Contents – Add table of contents to your blog posts for easy navigation.
  18. Reviews – Simple and easy to add business reviews from Google & Yelp.
  19. Modal Popup – Create conversion optimized popups for your website.
  20. Album – Create and show photo albums on your pages with advanced lightbox options with Album element.
  21. Reusable Block – Use WordPress Reusable Blocks in Bricks builder

PRODUCT BY BLOOMPIXEL

Max Addons for Bricks is created by team BloomPixel. The team is working in the WordPress ecosystem for the last 10 years and has developed many advanced plugins and themes.

POWERFUL DOCUMENTATION

Max Addons for Bricks is completely user-friendly, but if you have any issues using the Max Addons elements, you can check our extensive knowledge base. We have included detailed Step-By-Step Guides, How-Tos, and helpful tutorials for your help.

FRIENDLY SUPPORT

If you ever feel lost or need help, Our expert support team is always available for your help. Raise your query here!

LIKE MAX ADDONS FOR BRICKS?

We bet you do! Share your love and support by liking our page on Facebook. Do share your thoughts and reviews; your feedback is always motivating our team to do better.
sections.installation:
1. Install Max Addons for Bricks either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins section in WordPress dashboard
sections.faq:
What’s the requirement for using Max Addons for Bricks?

You need Bricks theme installed and active for Max Addons to work.

Will Max Addons for Bricks slow down my site?

Absolutely no! It delivers the code only on pages where you use it.

Do I need coding experience to use Max Addons for Bricks?

Not at all! All the elements and settings are easy to use with drag & drop interface.
sections.changelog:
1.4.0 – January 12, 2024

  • New: Element – Rating
  • Enhancement: Image Accordion – Added Item Label option to show label/title on closed items
  • Enhancement: Image Accordion – Added On Mouse Out option
  • Enhancement: Image Accordion – Moved Title HTML Tag option from Settings section to Content section
  • Enhancement: CTA Button – Added HTML tag option
  • Enhancement: Multi Heading – Added custom tag option
  • Fixed: Flip Box – Minor CSS issue

1.3.15 – September 21, 2022

  • Enhancement: Performance improvements
  • Enhancement: Image Accordion – Added query loop option
  • Enhancement: Multi Heading – Added box shadow option
  • Fixed: Multi Heading – Gap between headings option was not working when display stack option is selected
  • Fixed: Icon List – Minor layout fixes

1.3.14 – July 28, 2022

  • Fixed: PHP error in last update

1.3.13 – July 26, 2022

  • Fixed: Image Comparison – Meta box integration was not working
  • Fixed: Image Comparison – JS error when widget is used inside container query
  • Fixed: Content Ticker – Slider CSS file was always loading
  • Enhancement: Multi Heading – Inline display layout improvements
  • Enhancement: CTA Button – Moved typography options to Typography section in Style tab
  • Enhancement: Image Accordion – HTML structure optimization

1.3.12 – June 7, 2022

  • Enhancement: Fluent Forms – Added Box Shadow option for confirmation message
  • Fixed: PHP error when using theme other than Bricks
  • Fixed: Multi Heading – Layout was breaking when link was used in Background text

1.3.11 – May 12, 2022

  • Fixed: Minor CSS issues with Bricks 1.4 RC-2

1.3.10 – May 6, 2022

  • Fixed: Compatibility issues with Bricks 1.4 RC
  • Fixed: “MAX” prefix was not appearing over widgets
  • Fixed: Icon List – Text margin option was applying at wrong element
  • Fixed: Fatal error if child theme is activated

1.3.9 – April 21, 2022

  • Fixed: Most of the style options were not working with Bricks 1.4 beta

1.3.8 – April 2, 2022

  • Fixed: compatibility issues with Bricks 1.4 beta

1.3.7 – November 9, 2021

  • Fixed: Compatibility issues with Bricks 1.3.5

1.3.6 – October 27, 2021

  • Fixed: Icon List – JS error in the editor

1.3.5 – September 30, 2021

  • Fixed: Added minified version of script and styles for content ticker

1.3.4 – September 21, 2021

  • Fixed: Compatibility issues with Bricks 1.3.4
  • Fixed: Flip Box – Link option to internal post/page was not working
  • Fixed: Image Accordion – Icon Position Default was not working
  • Fixed: Image Accordion – Icon Spacing option was not working for SVG icons
  • Fixed: Icon List – Bug with SVG icon width and height options
  • Enhancement: Added “Max” identifier over all elements of Max Addons
  • Enhancement: Performance Improvements

1.3.3 – September 13, 2021

  • Fixed: CTA Button – PHP error in Bricks version 1.3.4-beta

1.3.2 – August 24, 2021

  • Fixed: Content Ticker – Disabling arrows was causing JS error

1.3.1 – August 20, 2021

  • Fixed: JS code for content ticker

1.3.0 – August 20, 2021

  • New: Content Ticker element

1.2.2 – July 27, 2021

  • Fixed: Compatibility issues with Bricks v1.3.2
  • Fixed: Icon List – Text margin option
  • Fixed: Flip Box – Icon color and font size options
  • Enhancement: CTA Button – Removed unnecessary options from Icon Typography control

1.2.1 – July 15, 2021

  • Fixed: Removed repetitive code from frontend.min.css

1.2.0 – July 14, 2021

  • New: Random Image element
  • Fixed: Icon List – Icon font size and color options were not working
  • Fixed: CTA Button – Icon positions “Before Title & Description” and “After Title & Description” were not working

1.1.1 – July 10, 2021

  • Fixed: Image Accordion – Lightbox option was not working on button
  • Added: Settings page link to plugin page

1.1.0 – July 3, 2021

  • New: Fluent Forms Styler element
  • Added: Gravity Forms – Title and description spacing options
  • Added: Contact Form 7 Styler – Title typography option
  • Fixed: Compatibility issues with Bricks v1.3

1.0.1 – June 30, 2021

  • Fixed: Flip Box – Bug with 3D effect

1.0.0 – June 19, 2021

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
Awesome Addons for Bricks Builder and Support is Top Notch

By Jornes (Jornes83) on September 24, 2022

MaxAddons for Bricks is an awesome and quality product, developed by a great developer. I have to say that Simrandeep (the dev) is so responsive and helpful when you report any bugs. He helped me with quick fixes always. Highly recommended going with this plugin and upgrading to the Pro version as a support.

Cool stuff!

By woodevpro on August 8, 2022

These add-on elements fill out the gap of bricks really well.

Best Bricks add-on so far, I think.

By wpsay on June 21, 2022

After trying the free version, I went for their Max Addons for Bricks Pro. Very happy with this plugin. I'd rate it as the best one for Bricks so far. I'm looking forward to seeing new features added over time.

Excellent Customer Service & Great Addon!

By sotongking on June 21, 2022

I encountered some issues which were solved immediately by the Developer – yes, immediately after I left a message to him. The previous plugins I tried had issues even after updating to a newer version. For example, it was not mobile-friendly even though it was supposed to be. Other features aren’t as user-friendly too. MaxAddons works right out of the box. Even with the issues, everything works as claimed. Now that it’s solved, this will be my #1 plugin for Bricks Builder that I will strongly recommend. The customer service from the Developer is impeccable!`

Fast, performant and great support - best Addon for Bricks Builder

By Joachim B. Auster (jba1969) on May 6, 2022

I use MaxAddons mainly for IconList element and FluentForms element. It works great with Bricks and helps me save a lot of time. And Simrandeep helps and listens if problems occur and fixes them asap. And I have to mention, that when I compared MaxAddons with Bricksable, MaxAddons is much faster and performant in backend-editor than Bricksable is. Seems to me, that MaxAddons is much better programmed. Nice and good to know. I really like MaxAddons and the supportive team in the background. :-)

Great elements

By brandontan903 on April 29, 2022

Great. good

Some Good Free Elements in Here

By tbutcher on January 12, 2022

Editing my review here. I initially gave this plug-in a low review because nothing appeared when I installed it. That is still true. However, the dev team reached out and mentioned that I might need to deactivate and then reactivate the elements and they would appear. This is indeed what happened. This, in my opinion, is a bug as they are all activated when you install and nothing appears. At least they were for me. Nevertheless, once installed, they have some nice stuff here that is very usable for the free version. It is also good that the dev team reached out (albeit a little spicy). ;)

Great Plugin with Awesome Elements

By wyamout on September 3, 2021

Didn't have any issues with the plugin it works flawlessly. Great support from the team too.
